main.cfKeyInvalid: Invalid key (must be a valid identifier)

Type "{phrase}" to confirm deleting field data from all records.
(Paste is disabled)
main.boxRemoveMiddlePrompt: Box {box} is not the last box. Choose numbering behavior after removal:
main.importPromptDesc: Copy the prompt below and send it to an AI (like ChatGPT, Claude, DeepSeek). The AI will convert your Excel/CSV data into YAML format that this software can import.
main.importStartupMessage: To import your existing Excel/CSV inventory data, you can use an AI to convert it to YAML format.
main.importPromptTemplate:
You are a data-cleaning and structuring assistant.
Convert my pasted Excel/CSV/table data into LN2 inventory YAML.

Rules:
1) Output YAML only. Do not add explanations.
2) Top-level keys must be exactly: meta, inventory.
3) Always include:
meta:
  box_layout:
    rows: 9
    cols: 9
  custom_fields: []
inventory: []
4) Data model is tube-level: each inventory item is one physical tube.
5) Required fields for each inventory item: id, box, frozen_at.
6) Optional fields: position, cell_line, short_name, plasmid_name, plasmid_id, note, thaw_events.
7) If a value is missing/unknown, use null.
8) Dates must use YYYY-MM-DD.
9) id must be unique positive integers.
10) If source uses positions like A1/B3, convert to numeric position:
    position = (row_index-1)*cols + col_index, where A=1, B=2...
11) thaw_events format:
    thaw_events:
      - date: "YYYY-MM-DD"
        action: "takeout"   # takeout/move
        positions: [1]
12) Do not invent fields not present in source.

Input data:
<<<DATA
[paste Excel/CSV/table data here]
DATA
main.exportTaskBundleDesc: Create a ZIP package for external agents (Codex/Claude Code). The bundle includes source files, schema, and conversion constraints.
main.importValidatedDesc: Validate an externally generated YAML file with strict local rules, then import it as a dataset.
main.importValidationFailed: Validation failed. Resolve errors before importing.

systemNotice.statsSummary: Stats: applied={applied}, failed={failed}, blocked={blocked}, remaining={remaining}, total={total}

code.empty_entries: At least one entry is required.
code.empty_positions: At least one position is required.
code.invalid_cell_line_options: Cell line options are not configured.
code.min_box_count: At least one box must remain.
code.no_fields: At least one field must be provided.
code.renumber_mode_required: renumber_mode is required when removing a middle box.
code.rollback_backup_invalid: Selected backup is invalid for current dataset.
code.write_requires_execute_mode: Writes are only allowed during plan execution.

errors.qtFontFaceFromHdcFailed: Font rendering warning: failed to load "{family}" via DirectWrite (DPI {dpi}). The app will use a fallback font.

errors.entriesRequiredCannotBeEmpty: entries is required and cannot be empty
errors.fieldsMustBeNonEmptyObject: fields must be a non-empty object
errors.modeMustBeOneOf: mode must be one of: fuzzy, exact, keywords
errors.operationMustBeAddOrRemove: operation must be add or remove
errors.positionMissingCannotInfer: position is missing and cannot be inferred for record_id={record_id}. record has no position (may be consumed).

hint.adjustInputByToolSpecs: Adjust `{tool_name}` inputs according to `tool_specs`, then retry.
hint.boxNotEmpty: Remove all active tubes from that box first, then retry remove operation.
hint.emptyPositionsOrEntries: Provide at least one target position or entry before retrying.
hint.invalidAction: Use a supported action value: takeout / move.
hint.invalidBoxOrPositionOrRecordId: Provide valid box IDs and valid positions in the current layout (e.g. 12 or A1).
hint.invalidMode: For `search_records`, use mode: fuzzy / exact / keywords.
hint.invalidMoveTarget: For move operations, provide a valid `to_position` different from source position.
hint.minBoxCount: At least one box must remain; do not remove the last box.
hint.noBackups: No backups exist yet; investigate write history first and confirm rollback intent with `question` tool before choosing a backup_path.
hint.pathOrPermission: Verify yaml_path exists and file permissions are correct, then retry.
hint.planPreflightFailedNoIds: One or more write operations are invalid against current inventory state. Review blocked details, then retry only corrected operations.
hint.planPreflightFailedWithIds: Preflight failed due to baseline integrity issues. Fetch affected records with `get_raw_entries` ids=[{ids_text}], then repair invalid fields via `edit_entry` (for example, normalize `cell_line` to configured options), and retry staging.
hint.positionConflict: Choose free slots via `list_empty_positions` or `recommend_positions`, then retry.
hint.positionNotFound: Use a position that belongs to the target record.
hint.recordNotFound: Call `search_records` first and use a valid `record_id` from results.
hint.renumberModeRequired: When removing a middle box, choose renumber_mode: keep_gaps or renumber_contiguous.
hint.validationOrRollbackInvalid: Rollback target is invalid for current file state. Re-check backup_path against audit/timeline and ask user confirmation with `question` if needed before retrying.
hint.writeRequiresExecuteMode: Write tools are execute-gated. Stage operations first, then let a human run Execute in GUI Plan tab. Use dry_run for preview-only checks.

input.allHistoryOnlyForSummary: all_history is only valid when view=summary
input.backupPathRequired: backup_path must be a non-empty string
input.boxNotAllowedWhenAdd: box is not allowed when operation=add
input.countNotAllowedWhenRemove: count is not allowed when operation=remove
input.manageStagedIndexOrKeyNotBoth: Provide either index OR action+record_id+position, not both
input.manageStagedNeedActionRecordPosition: action, record_id, and position are required when removing by key
input.manageStagedSelectorOnlyForRemove: index/action/record_id/position are only valid when operation=remove
input.recentCannotMixSearchFields: recent_* filters cannot be mixed with text/structured search fields
input.renumberOnlyForRemove: renumber_mode is only valid when operation=remove
input.summaryViewAllowedFields: view=summary only supports: view, days, all_history
input.useEitherRecentDaysOrCount: Use either recent_days or recent_count, not both

question.atLeastOneRequired: At least one question is required.

stage.stagedForHumanApproval: Staged {count} operation(s) for human approval in Plan tab: {summary}

add_entry.notes: Provide all sample metadata through fields object (e.g. fields.short_name, fields.cell_line).

batch_move.description: Record move for multiple tubes using explicit source and target slots.

batch_takeout.description: Record takeout for multiple tubes using explicit source slots.

edit_entry.description: Edit metadata fields of an existing record.

get_raw_entries.description: Fetch raw inventory records by ID list.

list_empty_positions.description: List empty positions, optionally within one box.

manage_boxes.description: Safely add or remove inventory boxes.

manage_staged.description: List, remove, or clear staged plan items.

query_takeout_events.description: Query takeout/move events, or timeline summary via view=summary.

question.description: Ask user clarifying questions when required values are unknown.
question.notes: question tool is not a write tool and must run alone.

recommend_positions.description: Recommend empty positions for new tubes.

record_takeout.description: Record takeout for one tube using explicit source slot.

record_move.description: Record move for one tube using explicit source and target slots.

rollback.description: Rollback inventory YAML to a backup snapshot using explicit backup_path.

search_records.description: Search inventory records, or list recently frozen records via recent_* filters.

validation.doesNotMatchAllowedSchema: {label} does not match any allowed schema
